ygData.subject: RE: Limit on song memorization
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont know what your problem is, but your sarcasm at my question was uncalled for. Not to mention that I didn t say a thing about whether Chant could stack
ygData.messageBody:
I dont know what your problem is, but your sarcasm at my question was
uncalled for. Not to mention that I didn't say a thing about whether Chant
could stack with Celerity. I asked if Celerity stacked with Anthem and if
so, WHY someone would stack Celerity and Chant.

> Yes, the reason why ppl stack Chant of Battle with
> Celerity is because it won't stack.
>
> Now that I have Celerity and
> stack it with Chant of Battle
> I never touch Bellows.
>
> Just curious, does Celerity stack with Anthem
> de Arms? If so, I'm interested in why one would
> choose Chant of Battle over Anthem.
